channel.title: Solumstone Development
channel.description:
[b][u]Goals[/u][/b] [i]The goal of this small team is to help me code V6 of my serverbatch (compiler) which will hopefully be a massive update compared to the previous releases. I need to a few people, three at the maximum, to help me code some of the ideas into the serverbatches. Applicants require no experience at batch programming, but need to be willing to learn and must be able to operate as part of a team as well as an individual. Applicants must also be able to meet deadlines.[/i]
[b][u]Achievements so far (by Syrillia)[/u][/b] [i]Successfully coded a file backup script. Successfully coded an auto-restarter. Successfully coded a commands generator. Successfully coded an auto-detect compiler, that will compile regardless of whether environmental variable have been set.[/i]
[b][u]Future achievements[/u][/b] [i]We hope to be able code an anti-decompiler code for closed-source clients and such. We hope to be able to code an anti-SYIPKPKER.[/i]
[b][u]The Team[/u][/b] [i]Team Leader - Syrillia[/i] [i]Coder 1 - X-J-K-X Coder 2 - Musicmad441 Coder 3 -[/i]
[b][u]Apply[/u][/b]
[code] Name: Experience, if any: Why do you want to join? [/code]
[i]If you have any suggestions as to updates found in version 6, please leave a post below. If you have nothing constructive to post, please do post at all. All Successful applicants will of course receive credit for participating in the group.
Thank you.[/i]

item.title: Solumstone Development
item.dc:creator: @Syrillia Syrillia
item.description:
@Syrillia wrote:

[quote=“musicmad441, post:6, topic:153865”]Name: Musicmad441

Experiences: Coded many compiler’s before, made the server Pkmad U.K, Very respectful.

What I want you join: I wish to join because I am very active, respectful, polite, and can manage alot of work at the same time.

Many Thanks

Musicmad441[/quote]

Looks good. Welcome. Once the team is complete I’ll send you instruction via PM.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Syrillia wrote:

OK then. Is there anyone else that would like to join? It will be a great learning experience.

Read full topic

item.title: Solumstone Development
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

[quote=“Syrillia, post:3, topic:153865”][quote author=X-J-K-X link=topic=210236.msg1841600#msg1841600 date=1193254067]
Name: X-J-K-X ?
Experience, if any: Coded for 1 yr an a few months.
Why do you want to join?: Well i’ve been looking for a reliable team that doesn’t just slack off, on the subject. For example. They take like a few weeks to get into the coding parts. My other reason is, you’re only letting 3 people in, which wont be too much of a fuss, sorting out parts that people are doing etc etc… Looks cool.
[/quote]

Accepted, welcome. Once the team has been assembled, you’ll receive instructions via PM. I hope you’ll be as valuable an asset to the team as you have been to Moparscape. I would ask you to download a copy of Version 5.5 from my site for reference purposes.[/quote]

Will do.

Read full topic

item.title: Solumstone Development
item.dc:creator: @Syrillia Syrillia
item.description:
@Syrillia wrote:

Goals
The goal of this small team is to help me code V6 of my serverbatch (compiler) which will hopefully be a massive update compared to the previous releases. I need to a few people, three at the maximum, to help me code some of the ideas into the serverbatches. Applicants require no experience at batch programming, but need to be willing to learn and must be able to operate as part of a team as well as an individual. Applicants must also be able to meet deadlines.

Achievements so far (by Syrillia)
Successfully coded a file backup script.
Successfully coded an auto-restarter.
Successfully coded a commands generator.
Successfully coded an auto-detect compiler, that will compile regardless of whether environmental variable have been set.

Future achievements
We hope to be able code an anti-decompiler code for closed-source clients and such.
We hope to be able to code an anti-SYIPKPKER.

The Team
Team Leader - Syrillia
Coder 1 - X-J-K-X
Coder 2 - Musicmad441
Coder 3 -

Thank you.[/i]
